description:
Moved by Tatsumi’s efforts to accomplish her goal all by herself, Mirai decides to help her even though she`s still in the middle of her mission.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chroniques vaporeuses : Les eaux de la résurrection
Die Ninja-Chroniken der Dampfwolke: Die Wiedererweckungsquelle!
